examples.example: 只要我们努力创造条件，就一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: As long as we strive to create conditions, we will surely be able to realize our own dreams.

examples.example: 虽然目前条件有限，但我们依然要保持乐观积极的态度去面对生活。

translate.english: Although the current conditions are limited, we still have to maintain an optimistic and positive attitude to face life.

examples.example: 尽管现在条件艰苦，但我们依然充满信心去迎接挑战。

translate.english: Although the conditions are difficult now, we still have full confidence to meet the challenges.
